constituent: two-mat area, soil, dirt, ground, even, water-lily, lily pad
heisigStory: This kanji belongs to an old Japanese system of measurement and indicates an area of about 36 square feet, or the area taken up by two tatami mats. Its elements: ground . . . water lily.
koohiiStory1: A two-mat area is just about as much ground as you will need for a lily pond.
koohiiStory2: A two-mat area is plenty of space for sleeping in a tent but you won´t be comfortable unless the ground is even.
